attributes.action: Nigel Farage To Be Our New Prime Minister
attributes.additional_details:
On Thursday 23rd June 2016 17,410,742 people voted to UK to leave EU.
Nigel Farage Led Us To leave EU and Have controller of our country.
I believe in interest in our country that Mr Farage should become Our Leader .
attributes.background: On Thursday 23rd June 2016 17,410,742 people voted to UK to leave EU. On 24th June David Cameron Step Down As Prime Minister of UK and I believe in interest in our country Nigel Farage should be made our New Prime Minister.

rejection.details: The Prime Minister of the UK is not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament
